name: Supernova
description: Supernova, formerly known as “Chronic,” is an indica-dominant hybrid strain bred by combining DJ Short’s iconic Blueberry with the Afhgani landrace Mazar-i-Sharif. Supernova is 14% THC, making this strain an ideal choice for experienced cannabis consumers. Leafly customers tell us Supernova’s effects include feeling sleepy, euphoric, and focused. Medical marijuana patients often choose Supernova when dealing with symptoms associated with pain, insomnia, and stress. Bred in Amsterdam, Supernova features tropical, spicy/herbal and tree fruit flavors. The dominant terpene of this strain is pinene.
